name: apinox
description: A visual SOAP client desktop application

scripts.build:packages: cd packages/request-editor && npm install && npm run build
scripts.compile-webview: npm run build:packages && cd src-tauri/webview && npm install && npm run build:skip-check
scripts.dev:webview: npm run build:packages && cd src-tauri/webview && npm run dev
scripts.dev:editor: cd packages/request-editor && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build:sidecar: cd sidecar && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prepare:sidecar: cd sidecar && npm install && npm run binary && cd .. && node scripts/prepare-sidecar-binary.js
scripts.tauri:dev: npm run build:packages && cd src-tauri/webview && npm install && cd ../.. && npx tauri dev
scripts.tauri:build: npm run increment-build && npm run sync-version && npm run build:packages && cd src-tauri/webview && npm install && cd ../.. && npx tauri build
